name: Gathering of Delightful Chests
description:
Every year, lootboxes from Call of Battle are attending GDC : Gathering of Delightful Chests. Bronze is a bit anxious about it and doesn't think to be cool enough to party with such awesome chests. Anyway, let's try to enjoy the night!

This game was made by Spica (writing) and Vincent Vially(Illustrations and code) for the Not Going to GDC Jam, we choosed the themes GDC, Impostor Syndrome and Loot Boxes.
